content:
Prodam lenovo thinkpad X230i z naslednjimi specifikacijami

- Intel Core i3-2370M (2.40GHz) 
- Intel HD Graphics 3000
- 4 GB DDR3
- 320 GB 7200 RPM
- 12.5 inch WXGA (1366x768) LED
- Windows 7 Profesionnal (64 Bit) nadgrajeno na WIn10Pro
-Osvetljena tipkovnica
-9 celična baterija https://www.amazon.com/Lenovo-0a36307-Extended-Battery-Laptop/dp/B0085MPIG6

Zraven dodam še docking station - priklopna postaja
https://www.amazon.com/Thinkpad-4337-10U-45M2489-45N5887-Docking/dp/B00NVO2RFS

Prevzem in ogled v Ljubljani ali po pošti

159€
bostjanpirih@gmail.com

0038641367946
author: pivoljub
